text:
Trust and Friendship

A dimly lit street; Razumihin is excited.  
“Do you trust me? Come, do you trust me or not?”  

---

A worried Avdotya looks at her mother.  
“He will certainly do what he promised.”  
“He has saved Rodya already!”  

---

Razumihin, exuberant, gestures grandly.  
“Nonsense! I’m not drunk from wine!”  
“It’s seeing you that’s turned my head!”  

--- 

Pulcheria hesitates, unsure.  
“Are you capable of this?”  
“Don’t mind me! I love you both!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Razumihin expresses his deep affection and concern for Avdotya and her mother while assuring them of his commitment to help Rodya.
